coref_content: even as BJP struggle to combat derisive nomenclature give by political rival in the poll - bind Bihar, party Gaya MP Hari Manjhi have come out with another damaging name for BJP : Baura Jayewala Party, or a party prone to craziness. other have call BJP Bharat Jalao Party, Bharatiya Jumla Party and Barka Jhuttha Party. prior to the arrival of Union HRD minister Smriti Irani to lay the stone Central University of South Bihar on the Magadh University campus on Monday afternoon, party Gaya MP Hari Manjhi and RLSP MLC Sanjeev Shyam Singh be engage in a friendly repartee. in half jest, RLSP MLC Sanjeev Shyam Singh say BJP have marginalize BJP and make it a BJP, not NDA, campaign. party Gaya MP Hari Manjhi, to the embarrassment of other party man, include Gurua MLA Surendra Sinha, reply, Ee Baura Jayewala Party hai. the MP far say if BJP could show the door to an old ally like Shiv Sena in Maharashtra during the last assembly election, the less say about other partner the well. unlike RLSP, Shiv Sena belong to the same Parivar ( family ), say the BJP MP in half Magahi and half Hindi. party Gaya, entertain those sit in the front row at the Directorate of Distance Education Auditorium ..

BJP President Shri  holds Janata Darbar at BJP HQ in New Delhi..
Election after election, the people of MP are reposing faith in the #BJP. I congratulate the party-workers for it: PM #Modi in #Bhopal..

the irony is he came from a minimal government tea party style party called the reform party..

( has since apologised for those comments about the only MP in the party hes bankrolling).
